content:
3.81. 
Types of matrimonial property regimes 
1. There is a distinction between matrimonial property regimes established by law and by contract. 
2. The legal regime of matrimonial property established by law is governed by Articles 3.87 to 3.100 of this Code. 
3. The matrimonial property regime established by contract is governed by Articles 3.101 to 3.108 of this Code.
